bibl.title: The Form and Structure of II and III John.
bibl.note: 1. The marks of common letter to be found in II and III John. - 2. The structure (i.e. the constituent elements) of the two epistles. - 3. The relation with the structure of the Pauline letter.
bibl.seg: Funk Robert W., The Form and Structure of II and III John.
1. The marks of common letter to be found in II and III John. - 2. The structure (i.e. the constituent elements) of the two epistles. - 3. The relation with the structure of the Pauline letter.
